question: I am currently staying at Hostel El Grial in Cusco, Peru. I will leave my hostel at 8 am. Give the most optimized order to visit these places. I will drive my car. A.Saqsaywaman -> Cusco Cathedral -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha (35 mins) B.Cusco Cathedral -> Qorikancha -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Saqsaywaman (37 mins) C.Saqsaywaman -> Qorikancha -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Visit Cusco Cathedral (48 mins) D.Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha -> Cusco Cathedral -> Saqsaywaman (33 mins)
answer_text: Saqsaywaman -> Cusco Cathedral -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha (35 mins)

answer_text: Leave Hostal El Grial at 8 am. -> Visit Cusco Cathedral (8:07 am - 9:37 am) -> Visit Qorikancha (9:46 am - 10:46 am) -> Visit Mercado Central de San Pedro (11:04 am - 12:04 pm) -> Visit Saqsaywaman (12:29 pm - 1:59 pm)

I am at Rydges Wellington. Starting from my current location, I will first go to Victoria University of Wellington, then to Lady Norwood Rose Garden, and finally return to my starting point. All the travel will be done on foot. How much time will the entire journey take? A.51 mins B.55 mins C.56 mins D.45 mins

I am at Rydges Wellington. Starting from my current location, I will go to Victoria University of Wellington by bicycle, walk to Lady Norwood Rose Garden, and return to my starting point by train. How much time will the entire journey take? A.40 mins B.42 mins C.44 mins D.46 mins
I am currently at Oakwood Premier Melbourne. I want to drive to Marvel Stadium and then to Melbourne Central. How long will this take? A.10 mins B.20 mins C.15 mins D.16 mins

I am currently staying at King Kong Hostel in Rotterdam. I want to visit the Kijk-Kubus Museum-house for 1 hour, the Erasmusbrug for 1 hour, the Museum Boijmans Van Beuningen for 1.5 hours, and the Market Hall for 1.5 hours. I have 6 hours available. I will leave my hostel at 9 am. What’s the maximum number of places I can visit? I will between places. A.None B.Two C.Three D.Four

I am currently staying at Hostel El Grial in Cusco, Peru. I want to visit Sacsayhuamán for 1.5 hours, Qorikancha Temple for 1 hour, the Cusco Cathedral for 1.5 hours, and the Mercado Central de San Pedro for 1 hour. I have 6 hours available. I will leave my hostel at 8 am. Give the most optimized order to visit these places. I will walk between places. A.Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha -> Cusco Cathedral -> Saqsaywaman B.Saqsaywaman -> Qorikancha -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Visit Cusco Cathedral C.Cusco Cathedral -> Qorikancha -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Saqsaywaman D.Saqsaywaman -> Cusco Cathedral -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha
answer_text: Saqsaywaman -> Cusco Cathedral -> Mercado Central de San Pedro -> Qorikancha
